text: No need to fight over UOB One vs OCBC 360. Make your own judgementhttps://youtu.be/M9S2D6xZxhE
can i check when did u credit the amount? mine still not earmarked yet
If I participate since Sept   will I still earn cash gift ? Now almost end of Aug ..
If plan to earmark from 1st Sept 2023  they will still take 30 Jun End Day Balance right?
How do I earmark? Does this mean I have to withdraw out my money on the 29th and then put i back in on the 1st of the next month?
If your 30th June day end balance isnâ€™t $1000 or less. Not worth taking part.
Hmm Iâ€™m not sure what u mean by this. If I have 105k in my bank then  before 30th I trf 100k to another bank and will transfer it back to UOB on 1 sept will it be considered earmarked ?
Will fail the increase in total balance condition.
The comparison date/balance is 30th June day end balance.

Yeap I understand. So I just have to trf it out on the 29th June correct? So assuming I got 105k. I trf out 100k means 30th June end day balance is 5k. Then on 1 sept I trf back in 100k. So will that be considered? Haha sorry Iâ€™m a noob on this as Iâ€™ve never done this before. But thanks for explaining!
Yes correct.But now is august. U cannot turn back time to 30th June anymore.
Oh sorry I meant I trf out on 29th august! Cause I see that for the month of September still can participate. Or can I only participate in July and I wonâ€™t be able to participate for sept anymore

Yes I know this was where u heading.Thatâ€™s the problem. No matter u want to participate in July august or September  uob will still compare against 30th June balance.So u move out on 29th august also useless.
Ahhh ok I see! I get what u mean liao. Thank you for explaining
Hi all  can prudential policies be paid with maybank platinum cc to earn cb?

Important- whenever making big purchase/transaction  always read TnC yourself. If TnC stated yes  it becomes a document that can support you when you call CSO to claim missing rewards.Any answer you get from CSO or chat group canâ€™t support you to claim the missing rewards.

5 working days from approval. But you can always use the UOB TMRW app to bind your card to Google Pay first.

Only Maybank Platinum Visa gives cashback for insurance policies  both initial and recurring premium.Miles counterparts are:1. Maybank Visa Infinite (1.2mpd  capped $3k monthly)2. Maybank Horizon Visa (0.4mpd)3. Standard Chartered Prudential Premium Visa (0.29mpd/0.4mpd)4. Standard Chartered Platinum Visa Signature (0.44mpd/0.6mpd)Summary for insurance payment using Visa credit cards:Prudential - Can pay all policiesAIA - Can only pay initial premium (recurring only on MasterCard)GE - Can only pay for accident/health and SGD life policies submitted after 15 Oct 2020  less UL policies (life policies after Jul 2014 that are inforce before 15 Oct 2020 only on OCBC-GE Cashflo Card  none for before Jul 2014)Singlife - Can only pay initial premiumThe rest you all look up yourself. ğŸ™‚

Yes this has been confirmed and addressed in the FAQ for having 2 cards.Point 9https://www.uob.com.sg/assets/pdfs/faqs-final.pdf

TLDR:UOB Lady card (no matter you have how many cards classic/solitaire/metal)  the MAX you can enjoy at any time is $3k cap per CALENDER MONTH on 2 categories.
